workflow.name: Customer support WhatsApp bot with Google Docs knowledge base and Gemini AI
workflow.description:
* Document-Aware WhatsApp AI Bot for Customer Support

* Google Docs-Powered WhatsApp Support Agent

* 24/7 WhatsApp AI Assistant with Live Knowledge from Google Docs

# üìùDescription Template

## Smart WhatsApp AI Assistant Using Google Docs

Help customers instantly on WhatsApp using a smart AI assistant that reads your company‚Äôs internal knowledge from a Google Doc in real time. Built for clubs, restaurants, agencies, or any business where clients ask questions based on a policy, FAQ, or services document.

# ‚öôÔ∏è How it works

- Users send free-form questions to your WhatsApp Business number (e.g. ‚ÄúWhat are the gym rules?‚Äù or ‚ÄúAre you open today?‚Äù)

- The bot automatically reads your company‚Äôs internal Google Doc (policy, schedule, etc.)

- It merges the document content with today‚Äôs date and the user‚Äôs question to craft a custom AI prompt

- The AI (Gemini or ChatGPT) then replies back on WhatsApp using natural, helpful language

- All conversations are logged to Google Sheets for reporting or audit

> üí°Bonus: The AI even understands dates inside the document and compares them to today‚Äôs date ‚Äî e.g. if your document says ‚ÄúClosed May 25 for 30 days,‚Äù it will say ‚ÄúWe're currently closed until June 24.

# üß∞ Set up steps

1. Connect your WhatsApp Cloud API account (Meta)

2. Add your Google account and grant access to the Doc containing your company info

3. Choose your AI model (ChatGPT/OpenAI or Gemini)

4. Paste your document ID into the Google Docs node



5. Connect your WhatsApp webhook to Meta (only takes 5 minutes)

6. Done ‚Äî start receiving and answering customer questions!

> üìÑ Works best with free-tier OpenAI/Gemini, Google Docs, and Meta's Cloud API (no phone required). Everything is modular, extensible, and low-code.

# üîÑ Customization Tips

* Change the Google Doc anytime to update answers ‚Äî no retraining needed

* Add your logo and business name in the AI agent‚Äôs ‚ÄúSystem Prompt‚Äù

* Add fallback routes like ‚ÄúEscalate to human‚Äù if the bot can't help

* Clone for multiple brands by duplicating the workflow and swapping in new docs


ü§ù Need Help Setting It Up?

If you'd like help connecting your WhatsApp Business API, setting up Google Docs access, or customizing this AI assistant for your business or clients‚Ä¶

üì© I offer setup, branding, and customization services:





WhatsApp Cloud API setup & verification



Google OAuth & Doc structure guidance



AI model configuration (OpenAI / Gemini)



Branding & prompt tone customization



Logging, reporting, and escalation logic

Just send a message via:





Email: tharwat.elsayed2000@gmail.com



WhatsApp: +20 106 180 3236

options.systemMessage:
You are [Company]‚Äôs support assistant for Black Ball Sporting Club.
‚Ä¢ Do NOT include any preamble such as ‚ÄúBased on the document you provided‚Äù or ‚ÄúOkay, [Name].‚Äù Just jump straight to the answer.
* don't ever start your response with"based on the document you provided" , or "According to the document", don't mention any documents at all , also don't mention today's date unless you asked

‚Ä¢ Extract the Google Doc‚Äôs plain text by joining its body.content textRuns

‚Ä¢ Build a field finalPrompt exactly as:

vbnet
Copy
Edit
Today's date is: [date]

[doc text]

User's question:
[body]
‚Ä¢ Return finalPrompt only.

parameters.content:
**Smart WhatsApp AI Assistant Using Google Docs**

üìå What it does:
Answers WhatsApp questions instantly using internal document knowledge. No training needed ‚Äî just update the doc.

üìÑ Reads a live Google Doc
üí¨ Receives WhatsApp messages
üß† Crafts AI prompt using today's date + message + doc
‚ö° Uses OpenAI/Gemini to generate a response
üì§ Sends reply back over WhatsApp

üß∞ Prerequisites:
- WhatsApp Business Cloud API account
- Google Doc with your business content
- OpenAI or Gemini API 
key
- you can setup the postgress memory using the following link:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JjBofKJnYIU


üõ† Setup:
1. Paste your Google Doc ID in the Docs node
2. Connect WhatsApp Cloud API (Meta)
3. Map the message field
4. Connect OpenAI or Gemini
5. Publish and test with a live message

You‚Äôre done!
ü§ù Need Help Setting It Up?
If you'd like help connecting your WhatsApp Business API, setting up Google Docs access, or customizing this AI assistant for your business or clients‚Ä¶

üì© I offer setup, branding, and customization services:
WhatsApp Cloud API setup & verification

Google OAuth & Doc structure guidance

AI model configuration (OpenAI / Gemini)

Branding & prompt tone customization

Logging, reporting, and escalation logic

Just send a message via:

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
